data.text: Naxan na yigiya Kore Xɔnna Ala ma,
N na a falama Alatala xa nɛn, n naxa,
A i ratangama nɛn luti ratixine birin ma,
I mi gaxun kɔɛɛn gbalon yɛɛ ra,
I mi gaxuɛ fitina furene yɛɛ ra
Muxu wuli kedenna faxama nɛn i dɛxɔn ma,
I i yɛɛn tima nɛn tun,
N bata n yigiya i tan ma Alatala.
fe ɲaxi yo mi i liyɛ.
Ala yamarin fima nɛn a malekane ma i ya fe yi
I tima yatane nun saɲine fari nɛn.
Ala naxa, “N na kanna rakisima nɛn
A na n xili, n na a yabima nɛn.
N yi siimaya xunkuye faɲin fi a ma,
